description: Public health experts say the highest level of restriction is needed across the Republic of Ireland.
title: Coronavirus: Highest level restrictions recommended in Republic of Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus: Highest level restrictions recommended in Republic of Ireland - BBC News
maintext: So Sunday night's recommendations by public health officials to move the entire state to Level 5 for up to four weeks shocked and surprised many in government, even though there has been a significant increase in the number of new coronavirus cases.
